services

Interface IServiceDB

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceDBStub, SQLServiceDB

    public interface IServiceDB
    An interface for database of services. The interface essentially declares CRUD operations. The key for distinguishing two services from each other is assumed to be a classical id.
    Author:
    Macky Dieng, Baptiste Vannesson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int create(Service s)
      Adds a service to the database.
      void delete(int id)
      Removes the service with a given id from this database.
      boolean exists(int id)
      Decides whether a service with a given id exists in the list.
      Service retrieve(int id)
      Returns the service with the given id.
      void update(Service s, int id)
      Updates a service in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        int create(Service s)
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a service to the database.
        Parameters:
        s - The service to add
        Returns:
        The id of the latest service inserted in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a service with the same id already exists in the list or a database access error occurs

      • retrieve

        Service retrieve(int id)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the service with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for
        Returns:
        The service with the given id in the list
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if no service with the given id exists in the list or a database access error occurs

      • exists

        boolean exists(int id)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Decides whether a service with a given id exists in the list.
        Returns:
        true is the list contains a service with the given id, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a database access error occurs

      • update

        void update(Service s,
            int id)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Updates a service in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the service to update
        s - An instance of Service to store in place of the existing one
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if no service is currently associated to the given id, or the new instance has an id which already exists in the database, or a database access error occurs

      • delete

        void delete(int id)
     throws java.lang.Exception
        Removes the service with a given id from this database.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the service to remove
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if no service is currently associated to the given id or a database access error occurs
